name: Pyramid Panic
description:
Pyramid Panic is a difficult arena shooter, where you are given a choice of two arenas to move onto after clearing a room. The game is short but has tons of replay-ability due to the amount of different paths you can take. The scoring system will also compel you to try again for higher scores.

This game supports x-input pads. The controls are rather self-explanatory, but if you need help be sure to read the readme included in the zip file.

I hope you enjoy!
